settings.heading: 10% EXTRA ON WINTER SALE
settings.text: This means that every single sale item has received an extra 10% off, which  could add up to 60% off. We also have updated the sale collection with new  items, shoes and accessories so now you can get familiar with any styles of  your favourite brands that you missed out.

settings.stl__description: Made of super-soft faux mohair, the grunge-inspired 1984 Mohair Stripe Cardigan features all-over jacquard-knit multicolored striping for a retro vibe. Cut with a buttoned front for easy layering, the cardigan is finished with rib-knit trims and an embroidered HUF logo at left chest.
